definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort
to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
broadcast/CL:個|个[ge4]/broadcasting/to broadcast/(formal) to propagate/to publicize
live broadcast (not recorded)/direct Internet broadcasting/(agriculture) direct seeding
to broadcast over a network/(radio or TV) hookup/simulcast
to replay/to rerun/(agriculture) to reseed/to oversow
webcast/to request item for broadcast on radio program/dibble seeding/spot seeding

pinyin: Ying1 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: Pass me the paper. I'll check the listings to see what's on.
sentences.chinese: 把報紙給我，我要看看節目表現在正在播什麼。

sentences.english: An implementation scheme of digital narrowcast system was presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種數字窄播系統的信息組播方案。

sentences.english: Player those of what I spend, file OK to sow WMA.
sentences.chinese: 我用的的那些播放器，播WMA文件都沒有問題。

sentences.english: Oh, I'm sorry. What's on channel two at 10:00PM?
sentences.chinese: 噢，對不起。晚上10點鐘第二頻道播什麼？

sentences.english: Our serial thriller begins at 7.30 this evening.
sentences.chinese: 我們蹬新系列精現菏事於今晚7時30鋼開始播傣。

sentences.english: After “Life” completes its run on Discovery, the episodes will be shown again in order on the Animal Planet channel.
sentences.chinese: 等探索頻道播完全集，動物星球頻道將接着進行重播。

sentences.english: Father planted some flower seeds in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 父親在院子裏播了些花種。

sentences.english: A little seed for me to sow.
sentences.chinese: 播一顆種子盼它快快長大。

sentences.english: Piroplasmosis is a kind of tick-borne protozosis world wide and is gaining increasing interest.
sentences.chinese: 梨形蟲病是一種越來越受關注的蜱播原蟲病。

sentences.english: TBP(Ticket-based Probing) algorithm is an effective unicast routing algorithm under imprecise network state information.
sentences.chinese: 算法是一種有效的非精確網絡狀態下單播路由算法。

sentences.english: When when sowing, everybody is sedulous listen.
sentences.chinese: 等到播的時候，大家都聚精會神的收聽。

sentences.english: I know podcasters who struggle to produce one podcast a week.
sentences.chinese: 我認識每週掙扎着做一個播客的播客人。

sentences.english: They sowed the fields with wheat.
sentences.chinese: 他們在田地裏播了麥種。
繼續播這張唱片愀寶貝。

sentences.english: I haven't heard the weather report on the radio. But I expect it will be warm, too.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有聽到收音機播的天氣預報，但我預計也會溫暖。

sentences.english: I enjoy watching Channel 5. They always have films from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡5頻道，它總是播世界名地的電影。

definition: to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
to broadcast over a network/(radio or TV) hookup/simulcast
to replay/to rerun/(agriculture) to reseed/to oversow
satellite TV (abbr. for 衛星電視|卫星电视[wei4 xing1 dian4 shi4])
China Central Television (CCTV), abbr. for 中國中央電視台|中国中央电视台[Zhong1 guo2 Zhong1 yang1 Dian4 shi4 tai2]
to direct a television or radio broadcast/director (TV, radio)
